description: Registry of AI personas/agents used for development tasks (like Google Gems)

AGT-001.title: n8n Development Workflow
AGT-001.description: Executable 6-phase protocol for n8n workflow development: FETCH → ANALYZE → MODIFY → PUSH → BACKUP → VERIFY.

AGT-002-RULES.title: Rule Audit Protocol
AGT-002-RULES.description: Validates rule files for structural integrity, consistency, and coverage.

AGT-002-CODE.title: Code Audit Protocol
AGT-002-CODE.description: Validates that the codebase correctly implements documented rules.

AGT-003.title: Workflow Contract
AGT-003.description: Standard interface for agentic workflows that can run locally or on n8n.

AGT-003-FOOTBALL.title: European Football Daily Workflow
AGT-003-FOOTBALL.description: Daily automated European football news aggregation with sentiment analysis and Facebook posting.

AGT-ARCH-PERSONA.title: n8n Architect Persona
AGT-ARCH-PERSONA.description: Expert persona for n8n architecture decisions and workflow design.

audit.description: Audit protocols for validating rules and code
